name: Isekai Survivors
description:
First experimental build 0.1

Yes, this game is clearly a knockoff of Vampire Survivors. - Entropy

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys to move around and select UI elements. 
Space / Mouse to click buttons.
ESC or Tab to pause and bring up options.

For testing purposes, currently holding down the Spacebar will speed up the game. Also, almost none of the UI currently works lolol. There is no way to lose at the moment... other than your device failing once the enemy numbers grow too great. 

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! \o/

Enjoy :) 

Roadmap:
  • 7 more weapons. 
  • 10 more equipment. 
  • Dynamic waves.
  • Difficulty scaling. 
  • 6 more enemies. 
  • Elite versions of enemies. 
  • 4 Bosses. 
  • Sound effects for everything.
  • Music.
  • Condense excess 'exp' into a single pickup to save on memory.
